description.value:
One of your ancestors was inspired by a nymph, or perhaps was a nymph themself, and now the beauty of nature lives in you.

Spell List primal

Bloodline Skills Diplomacy, Nature

Granted Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tanglefoot]; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Calm Emotions]; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Vision]; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vital Beacon]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Crushing Despair]; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Repulsion]; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfettered Pack]; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Moment of Renewal]; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Overwhelming Presence]

Bloodline Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Nymph's Token]; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Blinding Beauty]; greater: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Establish Ward]

Blood Magic Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, either granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round or imposing a -1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Self)], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)]
